name: PLANEYS
description:
NOTE: Wait until the connection status on the bottom-left of the screen is set to "Connected to master", and only then the "Join or create room" button will work.

An online multiplayer SHMUP made in 3 hours!

ControlsKeyboardGamepad (PlayStation)MovementWASD or Arrow KeysDPadShootSpace keyX button Credits:
  • Developed by Dan for the Friday Night Game Jam #2022-13
  • Shmup art pack by Kenney Assets
  • Music by mikeheartu
  • Sound effects were generated through sfxr

Thanks to all the people who were on the Twitch stream during the development of the game <3
